verses.verse: ( The Word Brings Salvation) ( ( 290 65:1-16 )) Ἀδελφοί <WG80> Adelphoi Brothers , ἡ <WG3588> hē - μὲν <WG3303> men - εὐδοκία <WG2107> eudokia desire τῆς <WG3588> tēs - ἐμῆς <WG1699> emēs my καρδίας <WG2588> kardias heart’s καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἡ <WG3588> hē - δέησις <WG1162> deēsis prayer πρὸς <WG4314> pros to τὸν <WG3588> ton - Θεὸν <WG2316> Theon God ὑπὲρ <WG5228> hyper for αὐτῶν <WG846> autōn [the Israelites] εἰς <WG1519> eis [is] for σωτηρίαν <WG4991> sōtērian [their] salvation .

καρδίᾳ <WG2588> kardia with [your] heart γὰρ <WG1063> gar For πιστεύεται <WG4100> pisteuetai [you] believe εἰς <WG1519> eis [and are] δικαιοσύνην <WG1343> dikaiosynēn justified , στόματι <WG4750> stomati with [your] mouth δὲ <WG1161> de and ὁμολογεῖται <WG3670> homologeitai [you] confess εἰς <WG1519> eis [and are] σωτηρίαν <WG4991> sōtērian saved .

Λέγει <WG3004> Legei says : γὰρ <WG1063> gar [It is] just as ἡ <WG3588> hē the γραφή <WG1124> graphē Scripture Πᾶς <WG3956> Pas “ Anyone ὁ <WG3588> ho who πιστεύων <WG4100> pisteuōn believes ἐπ’ <WG1909> ep’ in αὐτῷ <WG846> autō Him οὐ <WG3756> ou will never καταισχυνθήσεται <WG2617> kataischynthēsetai be put to shame .” ( (see also LXX))

οὐ <WG3756> ou no γάρ <WG1063> gar For ἐστιν <WG1510> estin there is διαστολὴ <WG1293> diastolē difference Ἰουδαίου <WG2453> Ioudaiou Jew τε <WG5037> te between καὶ <WG2532> kai and Ἕλληνος <WG1672> Hellēnos Greek : ὁ <WG3588> ho The γὰρ <WG1063> gar - αὐτὸς <WG846> autos same Κύριος <WG2962> Kyrios Lord πάντων <WG3956> pantōn [is Lord] of all , πλουτῶν <WG4147> ploutōn [and] gives richly εἰς <WG1519> eis to πάντας <WG3956> pantas all τοὺς <WG3588> tous who ἐπικαλουμένους <WG1941> epikaloumenous call αὐτόν <WG846> auton on Him ,

Πῶς <WG4459> Pōs How οὖν <WG3767> oun then ἐπικαλέσωνται <WG1941> epikalesōntai can they call εἰς <WG1519> eis on ὃν <WG3739> hon [the One] οὐκ <WG3756> ouk vvv ἐπίστευσαν <WG4100> episteusan in whom they have not believed ? πῶς <WG4459> pōs how δὲ <WG1161> de And πιστεύσωσιν <WG4100> pisteusōsin can they believe in [the One] οὗ <WG3739> hou of whom οὐκ <WG3756> ouk vvv ἤκουσαν <WG191> ēkousan they have not heard ? πῶς <WG4459> pōs how δὲ <WG1161> de And ἀκούσωσιν <WG191> akousōsin can they hear χωρὶς <WG5565> chōris without κηρύσσοντος <WG2784> kēryssontos [someone] to preach ?
